name: Tokyo Metro's Marunouchi Line in English
description:
Tokyo Metro's world-famous Marunouchi Line and its 28 stations, all translated into English.

Every Tokyo traveller knows these names: Shinjuku. Yotsuya. Ginza. But what's the meaning of these exotic syllables and their enigmatic Chinese hieroglyphs? Did you know that –– spoiler alert –– 'Ocha no Mizu' means 'tea water'?

This minimalist poster provides all the station names of the Marunouchi Line in English, along with a little bit of history. 

format: PNG
resolution: 3500×2500
artist: Issey Fujishima
location: Jakarta, 2021

Instagram: @isseyfujishima
